Why Human Centered Design? Human-Centered Design is important because it prioritises understanding and actively involving the needs, wants, and perspectives of the end-user throughout the design process. What are the 4 principles of Human Centered Design? The four principles of Human-Centered design (HCD) are: Empathise: Understand the needs and perspectives of the users Define: Synthesise the information gathered about the users Understand the
